thread.title: Samsung opens 10-story North American HQ in San Jose

author: Benny Evangelista
title: Samsung opens 10-story North American HQ in San Jose
text: Photo: Nathaniel Y. Downes, The Chronicle O.H. Kwon, Chief Executive Officer and Vice Chairman of Samsung Electronics, addresses the crowd at Samsung's opening ceremonies of a new 1.1 million square foot research and development, sales and marketing center on Thursday, Sept. 24, 2015 in San Jose, Calif. O.H. Kwon, Chief Executive Officer and Vice Chairman of Samsung... To continue reading this story, you will need to be a digital subscriber to SFChronicle.com. O.H.
